sql.name: table6_ResourceUsing_QuartyReportpage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: table6_ResourceUsing_QuartyReport.group
table6_ResourceUsing_QuartyReport.coltitle
sql.item: select distinct trim('一干')||'-'||trim('开通容量') from dual union all select distinct trim('一干')||'-'||trim('配置容量') from dual union all select distinct trim('二干')||'-'||trim('开通容量') from dual union all select distinct trim('二干')||'-'||trim('配置容量') from dual union all select distinct trim('城域网')||'-'||trim('开通容量') from dual union all select distinct trim('城域网')||'-'||trim('配置容量') from dual union all select distinct trim('开通容量')||'-'||trim('开通容量') from dual union all select distinct trim('配置容量')||'-'||trim('配置容量') from dual union all select distinct trim('一干')||'-'||trim('一干') from dual union all select distinct trim('二干')||'-'||trim('二干') from dual union all select distinct trim('城域网')||'-'||trim('城域网') from dual union all select distinct trim('合计')||'-'||trim('合计') from dual

sql.name: table6_ResourceUsing_QuartyReport.centervalue
sql.item: select distinct trim('一干')||'-'||trim('开通容量'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000013),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('一干')||'-'||trim('配置容量'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000048),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('二干')||'-'||trim('开通容量'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000005),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('二干')||'-'||trim('配置容量'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000054),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('城域网')||'-'||trim('开通容量'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000009),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('城域网')||'-'||trim('配置容量'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000056),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002
